SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client

Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ObserverImplementation.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client.ClientModel
public class ClientModel extends Observable<Message>
This class is a not complete copy of a model maintained by server. It represents the status of the game
Author:
Riccardo Figini, Francesco Lo Mastro

  • Method Details

    • setGrid

      public void setGrid(ObjectCard[][] grid, GridMessage.TypeOfGridMessage typeOfGridMessage)
      It sets a new grid. This method is used to update central grid
      Parameters:
      grid - new grid
      typeOfGridMessage - Type of update. It can be "initialized" or "after_move"

    • setLibrary

      public void setLibrary(String name, ObjectCard[][] library, Position[] oldInGrid, Position[] newInLibrary)
      It updates a player's library. If the last two parameters are null, this update is an initialization, otherwise it is a movement after move. The Last two parameters are useful for the view
      Parameters:
      name - Name of player
      library - new library
      oldInGrid - It identifies removed position in old grid
      newInLibrary - new element in a library. It identifies new positions in the library's grid

    • setPersonalGoalCard

      public void setPersonalGoalCard(ArrayList<Couple> goalList)

    • addPoint

      public void addPoint(CommonGoalMessage msg)
      This method updates/adds points in the model and create a special message for the view. This message uses variable already in the scope to set (in order) player's point, number of common goal reached with attribute "card" and the name of the player. The last two parameters are available common goal card's point
      Parameters:
      msg - Common goal card's message

    • getGrid

      public ObjectCard[][] getGrid()
      It returns the central grid

    • getCommonGoalPointsVector

      public int[] getCommonGoalPointsVector()
      It returns a vector with points available for both common goal cards
      Returns:
      int[] vector with points

    • getLibrary

      public ObjectCard[][] getLibrary(String name)
      It returns the library of a player specification in input parameter
      Parameters:
      name - name of player
      Returns:
      ObjectCard[][] matrix of object cards or null id player does not exist

    • setup

      public void setup(SetupMessage msg)
      This method sets up all information when the game begins. It sets all data in clientModel and then calls an observed that will print all information on view
      Parameters:
      msg - message with all initial informazione

    • getPlayerNames
